message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire [product name] for a price of $1,600,000. This is a unique product with significant value, and I believe it will be a great asset to your business.  I'm confident this price reflects its worth, and I'm open to discussing it further if you have any questions. However, I do have another interested buyer willing to purchase it for $1,500,000.  Let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.
